name: Turn based RPG Demo
description:
This is a turn based rpg similar to dragon warrior that I've been working on for a little bit. It pretty much ends once you get the boat but you can go to another island with some new enemies on it and sail around a little bit. 

It only uses two buttons Enter/Space - Accept, Shift - Back/Cancel. A controller can also be used, X - Accept, O - Back

Graphics by -
https://merchant-shade.itch.io/16x16-mini-world-sprites
https://limezu.itch.io/fantasy-battlers
